connectionId.title: Connection
connectionId.description: Select an existing Connection, or go to Knowledge > Database Connections to add one

query.title: SQL Query
query.description: An expression that resolves to the query string for selecting data from the database. Has access to the special ${earliest} and ${latest} variables, which will resolve to the Collector run's start and end time.

queryValidationEnabled.title: Validate Query
queryValidationEnabled.description: Enforces strict query validation that allows only â€˜select' statement to be entered in the Query field. Caution: Disabling query validation allows DDL and DML statements to be executed, which could be destructive to your database.

enabled.title: Enabled
enabled.description: Enable tracking of collection progress between consecutive scheduled executions.

trackingColumn.title: Tracking Column
trackingColumn.description: A numeric database column whose greatest seen value will be tracked. In the collector query, this column must be returned from the database in monotonically increasing fashion.
